title: Cannot run hardhat script in bun
body:
### Version of Hardhat

2.17.1

### What happened?

I created a `script.ts` file in `./scripts/ts` and I am trying to run it using [bun](https://github.com/oven-sh/bun), however it fails with the following error:
```

                     ^

```

### Minimal reproduction steps

1. Create a simple `script.ts` file in `./scripts`

```typescript
import hre from "hardhat";
console.log(await hre.network.provider.send('eth_chainId'))
```

2. Try to run the file with bun: `bun run ./scripts/backtester.ts`, this should fail with the above error.

bun
